scripts.uglify-js: mkdir -p build/dist/js && npx uglify-js src/js/*.js -o build/dist/js/scripts.min.js
scripts.minify-css: mkdir -p build/dist/css && npx cleancss src/css/*.css -o build/dist/css/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run uglify-js && npm run minify-css && npm run gzip-js && npm run gzip-css && npm run copy-to-repo
